title: Drawing, Design for Writing Table with Top Cabinet and Ionic Capitals Atop Legs, 1900–05
title_raw: Design for Writing Table with Top Cabinet and Ionic Capitals Atop Legs
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite along bottom of sheet: long writing table for Mr. Grew / ars[?] ago. and I want to make one exactly / [illeg.]; lower center and upper right of design: carving / carving / secret [illeg.] / back of lower drawers / wood / inlay / Brass rail; at center of design, numerical notations.
creditline: Gift of The Lake St. Louis Historical Society
description: Rectangular table top with molded central panel flanked by 2 drawers on either side; raised on 4 fluted, tapering, columnar legs with ionic capitals; central cabinet at rear of top consisting of recessed center flanked by 2 doors having extensions with 3 small drawers on either side.

participants.person_name: The Lake St. Louis Historical Society

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, Design for Writing Table with Top Cabinet and Ionic Capitals Atop Legs, 1900–05. Graphite on thin cream paper. 
Gift of The Lake St. Louis Historical Society. 2000-69-237.
